News.Title: Pulz Electronics: 1:1 Bonus Shares with October 25 Record Date
News.Summary: Pulz Electronics has announced a 1:1 bonus share issue, with the record date set for October 25, 2024. The company will hold an Extraordinary General Meeting on November 9, 2024, to approve the bonus issue. E-voting for shareholders will be open from November 6 to November 8, 2024.
